creditline: Gift of funds from Douglas and Victoria Holmen, the Hawthorne Advised Fund, in memory of Herbert and Janice Galloway
description: front apron panel; ties appear to be lost; medium blue waistband; dark blue body; red, white, and blue trim, with two bands of embroidered geometric patterns in white, tan, yellow and green at bottom edge
title: Apron, from a seven-piece costume
